text:
<Tsuki> Oooooooh, I remember something I did that was quite entertaining in BF3 Beta |3
<Tsuki> The friend that is taking me to the midnight, when we were playing the beta, strapped C4 on the side of my tank, just to be a jerk
<Tsuki> And I thought it was stupid, since there isn't Friendly Fire
<Tsuki> And so I'm drivin' a tank to the objective, where I run into 2 enemy tanks at once
<Tsuki> I'm like "SHIT! D:"
<Tsuki> What's wrong?
<Tsuki> 2 tanks!
<Tsuki> Get close to'm!
<Tsuki> Aaaaaaaaallllllrighty!
<Tsuki> *drives up close, to the point of hugging*
<Tsuki> What now?! D:
<Tsuki> *BOOM!*
<Tsuki> *Friend racks up 4 kills*
<Tsuki> *Friend laughs like crazy*
<Tsuki> The C4 he strapped to me made a homemade bomb out of my tank and killed the 2 enemy tanks coming to take the base o3o
